scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "VITE,ELECTRON" -c "cyan,magenta" "pnpm --filter react-app dev" "wait-on tcp:5173 && pnpm --filter electron-app start:dev"
scripts.lint: pnpm -r lint || pnpm --filter react-app exec eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx
scripts.type-check: pnpm -r type-check || pnpm --filter react-app exec tsc --noEmit
